directions: In a punch bowl prepare drink mix according to package instructions. Stir in pineapple juice and lemon-lime soda. Mix in the concentrated orange juice and lemonade. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
ingredients: 1 (4.6 ounce) package cherry flavored sweetened soft drink mix
1 (46 fluid ounce) can unsweetened pineapple juice
1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
title: Kool Ade Punch
